column4: ubuntu LTS releases (next will be in april) are supported for 5 years
We cannot see what the future holds, but for now Ubuntu is on a very accurate schedule

that it is indeed. That's why I offer the whole range from Ubuntu 9.10 to 11.10 to my customers. I just didn't want to go trough the pain of making a 8.04 Xen template, since I doubt that anyone would want it on a fresh server
and I know 9.10 is EOL, but I still wanted to offer it "just in case"
